history.proof: intros net e Hdc. unfold lifted_directly_committed. unfold directly_committed in Hdc. destruct Hdc as [quorum [Hnd [Hlen Hcom]]]. exists quorum. split. auto. split. auto. intros h Hin. specialize (Hcom h Hin). destruct (nwState net h) as [nwStateH]. simpl in Hcom. hauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface si : sorted_interface lmi : log_matching_interface smspi : state_machine_safety'interface rlmli : refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface pllsi : prevLog_leader_sublog_interface ctgt0 : current_term_gt_zero_interface lalcii : lastApplied_le_commitIndex_interface miaei : match_index_all_entries_interface lhlli : leaders_have_leaderLogs_interface lci : leader_completeness_interface lsi : leader_sublog_interface taifoli : terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface glci : ghost_log_correct_interface lphogli : log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs_interface glemi : ghost_log_entries_match_interface tci : transitive_commit_interface tsi : term_sanity_interface lhllsi : leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface ollpti : one_leaderLog_per_term_interface rmri : raft_msg_refinement_interface net : network e : entry quorum : list Net.name Hnd : NoDup quorum Hlen : length quorum > div2 (length nodes) h : Net.name Hcom : In (eTerm e, e) (allEntries (fst match net with | {| nwState := nwState |} => nwState h end)) Hin : In h quorum nwStateH : ghost_data d : data Unable to unify "In (eTerm e, e) (allEntries (fst match net with | {| nwState := nwState |} => nwState h end))" with "In (eTerm e, e) (allEntries (fst (nwState net h)))".

original: intros net e Hdc. unfold lifted_directly_committed. unfold directly_committed in Hdc. destruct Hdc as [quorum [Hnd [Hlen Hcom]]]. exists quorum. split. auto. split. auto. intros h Hin. specialize (Hcom h Hin). destruct (nwState net h) as [nwStateH]. simpl in Hcom. apply Hcom.
